騩字的基本解释

騩
guī
毛浅黑色的马。

騩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
［《廣韻》居追切，平脂，見。］
［《廣韻》俱位切，去至，見。］
［《廣韻》舉韋切，平微，見。］
(1)浅黑色的马。
(2)山名。即大騩山。在今河南省密县附近。
(3)山名。在今甘肃省敦煌市东南方的三危山西面。

騩字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騩； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1442第13
【唐韻】俱位切【集韻】基位切，?音愧。【玉篇】馬淺黑色。【漢儀】丞相見免，乗騩馬，自府歸。　又【廣韻】居追切【集韻】【韻會】居逵切，?音龜。義同。　又【廣韻】舉韋切【集韻】【韻會】居韋切，?音歸。山名。【後漢·郡國志】河南尹密縣有大騩山。【山海經】大騩之山，其隂多鐵，多美堊。　又【集韻】徒回切，音頹。白馬。　【字彙補】亦作?。

騩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
騩字的起名意思

毛浅黑色的马。

騩
Basic explanation of words
騩
guī
Black-haired horse.
騩
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
["Guangyun" is in pursuit, Pingzhi, see. ]
["Guang Yun" all cut, go to, see. ]
["Guang Yun" cite Wei Qi, Ping Wei, see. ]
(1) Light black horse.
(2) The name of the mountain. That is, Daxuan Mountain. Near Mi County, Henan Province today.
(3) The name of the mountain. In the west of Sanwei Mountain, southeast of Dunhuang City, Gansu Province.
騩
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【horse character department】　騩; Kangxi strokes: 20; page number: page 1442 13
[Tang Yun] All position cut [Ji Yun] Basic position cut, sound shameful. [Jade articles] Horse light black. [Han Yi] Meet the prime ministers, ride horses, and return from the house.　[Guang Yun] Ju Chaiqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Ju Kuiqie, sound turtle. The same meaning.　 [Guang Yun] Ju Wei Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ju Wei Qi,? The sound goes. Mountain name. [The History of the Later Han Dynasty] There is Daxuan Mountain in Yinmi County, Henan. 【Shan Hai Jing】The mountain of the big horse, its yin is more iron, and more beautiful and chalky.　[Jiyun] again, cut back, sound distressed. White horse.　【Word Supplement】also made?.

guī, tuī

тёмно-гнедой, тёмно-серый (масть лошади)
騩马 лошадь тёмно-гнедой масти
